item.title: Install the OpenCV library on Visual Studio
item.description: Compiling the libray There are many benefits of compiling the library from source instead of using the pre-compiled version: Supporting the latest IDE (Vision Studio). For example, pre-compiled OpenCV 3.0 (22/11/2015) is not compatible with Visual Studio 2015. Be able to customize the library, we can add several options to OpenCV, for example, we can add APIs for Kinect SDK, OpenCL, Python, etc. Down the source code for the Windows environment here.
